document_data.name: Silent Helpers
document_data.mainbody: '''Silent Helpers''' were [[priestess]]es that composed a portion of the clergy of [[Shiallia]], the Lady of the Woods.
document_data.Activities: What differentiated Silent Helpers from the rest of Shiallia's clergy was the work they were focused on. Silent Helpers watched over lost children and others who were simply unaware of the dangers lurking within the woods, specifically the [[High Forest]]. The famous [[bard]] [[Olithard]] was believed to have been rescued by a trio of Silent Helpers.
